DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Company
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":24,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":null},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"
select  c.Name,
        c.Code,
        c.oid as Oid,
        cr.Name as Currency,
        c.TimesheetStart,
        c.GanttChartResourceType as ResourceType,
        c.ProjectArticle,
        c.HoursType,
        c.MarginType,
		a.Name as Article
from    company c left outer join Article a on (c.ProjectArticle = a.Oid) left outer join currency cr on (cr.oid = c.currency)
where	c.GCRecord is null","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]
